name: HOSTS file switcher
short_description:
A quick afternoons coding:
I was building a website and wanted to check if google ads were working on the page, but I have long been a user of the hosts file and was using this to block a whole lot of ad servers. 

to make it easier to switch between showing ads (for web dev work) and blocking ads (for personal browsing) i came up with this idea.

The program has a set of preconfigured hosts files that can be quickly swapped to enable or disable certain domains.

written in python (3.3).
compiled using cx freeze.

will continue to update as and when i can.
summary: easily change the hosts file. easily block ads or show them in a click

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users
